children.subject: That is ridiculous. Apparently on thegradcafe there are also several people posting who haven't heard back.

i haven't heard anything either :( but from the MEng twitter it seems offers were sent and everything? https://twitter.com/FungInstitute/status/1250491608862035968

But I'm so confused

history.content:
Has anybody received any communication on what is going on with the MEng program? I emailed mengadmissions-eecs@berkeley.edu and gradadm@berkeley.edu and was only met with automated emails and no information on even a delayed timeline. The decisions were supposed to be out in March and have a deadline mid April. I obviously understand that there could/would be a delay (for the decisions and deadline), but a simple mass email sent to all applicants would've been nice. Instead, we have had no communication for results or what their (even perspective) plan is for the Fall. The whole thing has been handled a bit unprofessionally.

If anybody can share any information or might know who to contact it would be much appreciated!
history.subject: MEng Admissions
